00077 void CTxtMsgDeleteRequestDlg::OnEnChangeEditMsgId()
00078 {
00079     UpdateData( TRUE );
00080     if( mMessageId != "" )
00081     {
00082         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00083     }
00084     else
00085     {
00086         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00087     }
00088 }    /* OnEnChangeEditMsgId() */

00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void CTxtMsgDeleteRequestDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00098 {
00099     UpdateData( TRUE );
00100 
00101     mCom.sendMessageDeleteRequest( MessageId( mMessageId, mCom.mClientCodepage ) );
00102     OnOK();
00103 }    /* OnBnClickedOk() */
